channel.title: [TuT] Aryan newbie Guide
channel.description:
edit:read the rules
I have gotten a lot of newbie question on msn. So know i am making the guide thats answers all your question!
First Download Aryan You can download the newest version of Aryan here: LINK removed...search for link! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search
[b]The Ultimate Aryan Newbie Guide[/b]
[u]MENU[/u] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1. How start a aryan and run a script 2. How to stop a script! 3. How to change world 4. All commands in Aryan (like get tile) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1. ---- How to start aryan and run a script ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b] First click the[b] Compile-All.bat[/b] else click the [b] Compile-Classes.bat[/b] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/339/1004sr.jpg[/img] Now a new window should popup. [img]http://img431.imageshack.us/img431/5341/2006bc.jpg[/img] [b][u]If this not popup: do this: [/u][/b] http://www.fagex.net/board/viewtopic.php?t=7339
[b]ELSE[/b] Click the[b] run-bot.bat[/b] in your aryan folder! [img]http://img320.imageshack.us/img320/202/11bq.png[/img]
Now go and look at the [b]commandbox[/b] [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/5262/24ki.png[/img] It should look like this. Depending on what script you have.. The Importen here is the commands under the script name. Etc: /pickFlax() Remember the command of the script you want to run!
Now click [b]File[/b] & [b]Run[/b] [img]http://img320.imageshack.us/img320/7028/38bs.png[/img] Now a InputBox should popup. Place the [u]command of the script[/u] you want to run in it. ETC: /pickFlax() [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/4233/47tb.png[/img]
And click [b]OK[/b] And let the script do its magic!
[b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2. ---- How to stop a script! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
Go to [b]File[/b] and click [b]Stop all Scripts[/b] This will stop all the script you are running! [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/6862/57qm.png[/img] If you only want to stop an certan script. Click [b]File[/b] and click [b]Stop Script[/b] Now a input box should apear! [img]http://img129.imageshack.us/img129/113/63yt.jpg[/img] Place the command of the script you want to stop here! [u][i]This doÃƒƒÃ‚Â¨sn`t work every time[/i][/u]
[b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 3. ---- How to change world ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
First logout of your account! Then click [b]File[/b] and [b]Change World[/b] [img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/7403/77do.jpg[/img] Now a input box should apear! Write the world you want to play in. in it! And hit [b]OK[/b] [img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/6500/85dx.jpg[/img] Now click File [b]File[/b] and [b]Update Server[/b] [img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/3676/92rg.jpg[/img] And login to your account.. You should now be in a new World. Only if the server is not full!
[b]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 4. ---- All commands in Aryan (like get tile) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/b]
[b]- F1 ---[/b] The change server popup! [b]- F2 ---[/b] [b]- F3 ---[/b] Gives the items IDs in inventory. Goes from position 0 - 27 [b]- F4 ---[/b] Gives the CO, shows like [b]new Tile(4404,5355)[/b] [b]- F5 ---[/b] Tells you the animation ID! [b]- F6 ---[/b] Sets debugging On and Off [b]- F7 ---[/b] Enable and Disable Graphics [b]- F10 ---[/b] Opens [b]File[/b]
Got the error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffound error: Bot[/code]
Here is a video that show what to do!! Plz do this on a version you havvend edit!
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ZFEJID8V
EDIT: Another link http://rapidshare.de/files/13820138/aryan.avi.html
[b]If your pc wont play avi movies! then convert it to wmv[/b]
first of all! search the net! http://www.google.dk/search?hl=da&q=converter+avi+2+wmv&btnG=S%C3%B8g&meta=
you could use the trial of this program! http://www.video-converter.net/
and then convert your file to [b]wmv[/b]
[b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/b] [i]I cant think of anymore problems leecher can have[/i] [u]So Bye for now[/u] :-D

item.title: [TuT] Aryan newbie Guide
item.dc:creator: @hs_millions hs_millions
item.description:
@hs_millions wrote:

edit:read the rules

I have gotten a lot of newbie question on msn.
So know i am making the guide thats answers all your question!

First Download Aryan
You can download the newest version of Aryan here:
LINK removed…search for link!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

The Ultimate Aryan Newbie Guide

MENU

  1. How start a aryan and run a script
  2. How to stop a script!
  3. How to change world
  4. All commands in Aryan (like get tile)

[b]

  1. ---- How to start aryan and run a script
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
    First click the Compile-All.bat
    else click the Compile-Classes.bat

    Now a new window should popup.

    If this not popup: do this:
    http://www.fagex.net/board/viewtopic.php?t=7339

ELSE
Click the run-bot.bat in your aryan folder!

Now go and look at the commandbox

It should look like this. Depending on what script you have…
The Importen here is the commands under the script name.
Etc: /pickFlax()
Remember the command of the script you want to run!

Now click File & Run

Now a InputBox should popup.
Place the command of the script you want to run in it.
ETC: /pickFlax()

And click OK And let the script do its magic!

[b]

  1. ---- How to stop a script!
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]

Go to File and click Stop all Scripts
This will stop all the script you are running!

If you only want to stop an certan script.
Click File and click Stop Script
Now a input box should apear!

Place the command of the script you want to stop here!
This doÃƒƒÃ‚Â¨sn`t work every time

[b]

  1. ---- How to change world
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]

First logout of your account!
Then click File and Change World

Now a input box should apear!
Write the world you want to play in. in it!
And hit OK

Now click File File and Update Server

And login to your account…
You should now be in a new World.
Only if the server is not full!

[b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4. ---- All commands in Aryan (like get tile)

[/b]

- F1 — The change server popup!
- F2 —
- F3 — Gives the items IDs in inventory. Goes from position 0 - 27
- F4 — Gives the CO, shows like new Tile(4404,5355)
- F5 — Tells you the animation ID!
- F6 — Sets debugging On and Off
- F7 — Enable and Disable Graphics
- F10 — Opens File

Got the error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffound error: Bot

Here is a video that show what to do!!
Plz do this on a version you havvend edit!

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ZFEJID8V

EDIT:
Another link
http://rapidshare.de/files/13820138/aryan.avi.html

If your pc wont play avi movies! then convert it to wmv

first of all! search the net!
http://www.google.dk/search?hl=da&q=converter+avi+2+wmv&btnG=Søg&meta=

you could use the trial of this program!
http://www.video-converter.net/

and then convert your file to wmv

[b]

[/b]
I cant think of anymore problems leecher can have
So Bye for now

Read full topic
